Cold email automation tool for sales tea: 销售团队发送个性化推广活动的冷电子邮件自动化工具
\nTo obtain your API key:\n1. Log into y:
To obtain your API key:
1. Log into your Woodpecker account
2. Go to Marketplace (top-right) → Integrations → API keys
3. Click **Create a key**
4. Copy the key and paste it here
Create/Update Prospect in Campaign: 在营销活动中创建/更新前景
Find Prospect by Email: 通过电子邮件查找前景
Adds a new prospect or updates existing: 在活动中添加新的前景或更新现有的前景数据
在全球前景列表中添加新前景或更新现有前景
Add a domain to the blacklist to block s: 将域添加到黑名单以阻止发送到该域内的所有前景
Fetch all responses from a specified pro: 从指定的前景获取所有响应
Search for a prospect by their email add: 通过他们的电子邮件地址搜索前景
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Include Campaign Details: 包含营销活动详细信息
Select the campaign to add prospects to: 选择要添加前景的活动
Tags starting with # separated by spaces: 以# 开头的标签以空格分隔(如：#VC #Startup)
Custom snippets for personalization (sup: 个性化的自定义代码片段 (支持 HTML)。最大 15 代码片段。
Earliest date and time the prospect can: 可以联系的最早日期和时间
Add prospect even if their global status: 即使他们的全局状态未激活，也添加前景(谨慎使用)
Name of the import batch (visible in the: 导入批量的名称 (在导入的列中可见)
If enabled, updates existing prospect da: 如果启用，更新现有前景数据。如果禁用，现有前景保持不变。
Tags starting with # separated by spaces: 以空格分隔的 # 开头的标签 (如：#VC #Startup)。更新时附加到现有的标签。
Replaces all existing tags with these (o: 替换所有已存在的标签 (仅在更新时)。使用空字符串清除所有标签。
Email address to search for (exact match: 要搜索的电子邮件地址 (完全匹配或部分)
Include information about campaigns the: 包含关于未来项目注册的信息
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
HEAD: 黑色
Follow-up After Autoreply: 自动回复后的后续行动
Triggers when a prospect replies to an e: 当前景回复电子邮件或其状态被手动设置为 REPONDED 时触发
Triggers when a prospect is added to the: 当前景被添加到黑名单时触发
Triggers when a prospect opts out from r: 当前景退出接收电子邮件时触发
Triggers when an email to a prospect bou: 当电子邮件到前景弹出时触发
Triggers when a prospect email is marked: 当前景邮件标记为无效时触发
Triggers when an autoreply is detected f: 从前景检测到自动回复时触发
Triggers when a prospect is marked as no: 当前景被标记为不响应时触发
Triggers when a prospect clicks a link i: 当前景点击电子邮件中的链接时触发
Triggers when a prospect opens an email: 当前景打开电子邮件时触发
Triggers when a prospect is marked as in: 当前景被标记为感兴趣时触发
Triggers when a prospect is marked as ma: 当前景标记为稍后时触发
Triggers when a prospect is marked as no: 当前景被标记为不感兴趣时触发
Triggers when a campaign email is sent t: 当营销活动邮件被发送到前景时触发
Triggers when a follow-up is scheduled a: 自动回复后排定后的后续行动时触发
Triggers when a secondary email address: 当次要电子邮件地址回复时触发
Triggers when a task is marked as done: 任务标记为已完成时触发
